reviews.review: If you dont like it then just stfu
Best first person shooter ever made.  I started playing with CS 1.3 in the Early 2000's.  Took a long break since 2010 and still amazing.

1)токсичное комьюнити
2)маленькие школьники
3)здоровьем твоей мамы поинтересуются не только враги , но и союзники
4) читеры которые жёстко палятся , а потом говорит что это скилл
5)не кикнут чела с крутилкой ,но зато кикнут тебя за то что тебе повезло с прострелом
6)если ты играешь на сильверах то забудь что такое баланс
7)игра может за фризить от каждого твоего шага
8)при фиксах одного бага, выходят 3-ри новых бага
9)запускаешь игру и попадаются 4 поляка, которые говорят f**king russian, или stfu russian.
Крч игра класс , всем советую.
Мне понравилось
Its fun but a lot of hackers
Honestly what can i say, nothing this game is trash.
No quiero jugar mas, peor que la cocaina
The only bad part about this game is the toxic side of the community and hackers.
если ты хочешь боли для своей попки, то тебе сюда)))
Игра гавно, много читеров, звание снимают из-за них, не расходуйте нервы долбаeбы

Matchmaking er broke. Valve har tapt kampen mot cheaters....

Må laste ned egen platform for å spille competetive
Best fps game, but too many cheaters. TOO MANY
olm rütbe atlayamıyoruz ki 210 saatir gümüş 1 kaldık ya saçma
The game if full with cheaters and exploits to get hacked. And Valve dont give u fuck . Game full of Russians. Valve eat a dick.
Mucho ragger como mi amigo el Moro, no lo recomiendo a personas con poca paciencia
Infelizmente tem mais xiter do que player ultimamente... Ta virando um Combat Arms esse game. Parabens por tornar o jogo free Valve e por não dar mais suporte
sympas , mais beaucoup trop de cheater
learn to click head so you know spray pattern for every gun
what have you done gaben my wife left me and took the kids i cant stop unboxing cases
Slow but fun game, striving community still active after so many years.
really makes you feel like counterstrike
Sem duvidas melhor FPS Online!!!! Chato são os Hacks, deveria voltar a ser pago para diminuir!
I mean yeah it's ok. You'll get obsessed with it and ruin your life cause you play CS so much but yeah get it it's alright I guess

Every game will have at least 1 or 2 cheaters (Either team might have them) and Valve will willingly not ban then (Given that they probably provide the cheats to begin with), besides having cheaters, you will always get screaming Russian kids that aren't old enough to hold the mouse even, let alone play video-games.
Great gameplay and teamplay. Best FPS if you like to compete without all the grinding, paying your way to upgrades etc.
this game is the best game in life history

No recomiendo jugar a este juego del orto lleno de chiteros el MM no se puede jugar solo queda ir faceit gc ... y ni hablar de los problemas de servidores que tienen todo el dia meten una actualizacion de 10 mb y rompen el juego una semana y te vuelven a meter otra actualizacion de 10mb para romperlo de vuelta... valve no hace un choto nefasto sus programadores tantas horas dedicadas a un juego para no poder entrar y tirar una partida tranquilo en condiciones y sin chiteros para completar volverlo gratis fue lo peor q hicieron...
lo unico que hace valve es meterte una caja o una operacion cada tanto y listo nefastos con todo el dinero que generan no hacen nada bien.
HARİKA, sinir hastası olmak için müthiş bir oyun
NICE GAME GG , PUTIN LOVE THIS GAME :3
